column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////This is walking distance within our neighborhood so I come here a lot to meet friends.  I have basically tried every item on the menu and bakery thus far
column2: including their drinks.  It's a nice place to grab bites and gather
column3: but I'm never completely impressed with the food.  There's always something slightly too audacious or too timid about the items on the menu.  Maybe because it is a rather "upscale" bakery
column4: you're more tempted to assume that the execution should be on point.  For example
column5: their coffees often taste weak yet slightly burnt
column6: while the pastries are overly sized and sweet.  The ambiance is indeed nice
